official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for title X of the Public Health Service Act.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize FY 1985 and 1986 appropriations for family planning services, personnel training, and informational and educational materials.
